html:
B&H Photo has teh OBSBOT Meet 4K Webcam in their DealZone forr $89 (Reg $149) today. This is a great 4K webcam that I have used for about a year now.

Purchase

  • OBSBOT Meet 4K Webcam $89 (Reg $149)

OBSBOT Meet 4K Webcam Overview

  • UHD 4K at 30 fps | 1080p at 60 fps
  • AI Auto Focus with 4x Digital Zoom
  • HDR | Auto Exposure | AI Auto Framing
  • 86° Diagonal Field of View
  • Dual Omnidirectional Microphones
  • Virtual Background
  • USB Type-C Interface
  • Mounting Clip and 1/4″-20 Tripod Thread
  • Privacy Cover Included
  • Windows and Mac Compatible

The Meet 4K streams Ultra HD 4K video at up to 30 fps, although it can also stream 1080p video at up to 60 fps. It can also rotate 90° into portrait mode, which offers users a vertical 9:16 aspect ratio.

Also featured is a 1/2.8″ CMOS image sensor, 4x digital zoom, HDR for improved image quality, and dual omnidirectional mics with a 9.8′ pickup range.

It can be mounted using an included magnetic mount, or place it on a tripod using its 1/4″-20 thread. Compatible with Windows and Mac, the Meet 4K may be connected to your host system using a USB Type-C port that supports 5 Gb/s USB 3.2 Gen 1 or 480 Mb/s USB 2.0.

Purchase

  • OBSBOT Meet 4K Webcam $89 (Reg $149)

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
